notes: For compatibility with very old engines, `Map.prototype.delete` must be accessed using square bracket notation because 'delete' is a reserved word. `myMap.delete()` is an error in IE8. Use `myMap['delete']()` instead.
The test suite for this polyfill is derived from work of Andrea Giammarchi which is [published under an MIT licence](https://github.com/WebReflection/es6-collections)
